UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides protect coho salmon from Vibrio anguillarum infections.
Literature.Author: Jia X, Patrzykat A, Devlin RH, Ackerman PA, Iwama GK, Hancock RE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=4µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar typhimurium MS7953s(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=4µg/ml)
